description.en: MetaBetMask.com is the first fully decentralised sports betting marketplace enabled by smart contracts where betting odds are determined by the total of user’s bets and 100 % of all bet pools are distributed to the winners without bookmaker fees. GOAL tokens are the betting currency for football match bets on MetaBetMask.com without bookmaker fees or commissions.
